products.title: Infusion Asc Stone Grey Perfect Fit
products.description: Infusion asc stone grey perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their infusion asc range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter.

products.title: Pearl China Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: A great way to keep your home feeling light and open but also cosy and warm. This pearl china aluminium venetian blind is a subtle off-white that is full of class. It comes with its own perfect fit frame that simply clips onto the rubber bead of your upvc frame so you don't even n a great way to keep your home feeling light and open but also cosy and warm.

products.title: Oyster Pearl Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Oyster pearl is an ever so slightly off white that brings a touch of elegance to the party. Ideal for keeping your decor feeling light and airy but without the starkness of a pure white. It also comes with a perfect fit frame that's made for upvc frames and becomes an integral par oyster pearl is an ever so slightly off white that brings a touch of elegance to the party.

products.title: Metallic Silver Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: This blind is the ultimate in modernity. We're not saying space age exactly but we're sure the martians would be impressed. The brushed metallic finish looks stylish and the integral frame is as easy as they come. With no need for drills or power tools, these frames simply click t this blind is the ultimate in modernity.

products.title: Silver Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Sometimes the most elegant look is created simply. This silver venetian blind is incredibly simple but really looks the part. A simple, metallic silver finish that feels incredibly contemporary. It's a hardwearing blind too, which makes it versatile. Pop it in the kitchen or bathr sometimes the most elegant look is created simply.

products.title: Mid Grey Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: There's nothing middle of the road about these mid grey perfect fit venetian blinds, they're certainly at the top of their game. The smooth, sleek grey slats are incredibly stylish, and incredibly robust. If that wasn't enough to make these blinds perfect for a modern home, then th there's nothing middle of the road about these mid grey perfect fit venetian blinds, they're certainly at the top of their game.

products.title: Pearl China Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: The pearl china blind is soft and warm and shimmers wonderfully in the light to offer a touch of elegance and class. With a hint of cream, this off-white shade is ideal in neutral settings. The design blocks out the harsh rays of the sun to create a warm and comfortable setting to the pearl china blind is soft and warm and shimmers wonderfully in the light to offer a touch of elegance and class.

products.title: Oyster Pearl Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: This warm white oyster pearl blind will give your conservatory a bright and open aspect. Not quite pure white, the merest hint of cream in this colourway will ensure a cosy and inviting feel at all times.

products.title: Metallic Silver Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: With a brushed metal finish, this metallic silver perfect fit venetian blind is stylish and contemporary. The lunar grey colourway with sweeping strokes add real depth to this modern looking blind.

products.title: Silver Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Pure and simple, this metallic silver venetian blind will work a treat in conservatories with silver finishes. Helping to create a chic and polished look this blind is a timeless and classic choice.

products.title: Mid Grey Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: With a matt finish and mid grey tone this venetian blind is darkly elegant and a superb accompaniment to other sophisticated and stylish finishes. This smart blind will work equally well with other deep shades or maybe lighter greys.

products.title: Gloss White Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: White never goes out of style, and this gloss white in particular will provide bright and timeless style. As if it didnt look sleek enough, a surrounding frame gives the blind a seamless feel to it that makes it look integrated into your window. All of that style and sleek white never goes out of style, and this gloss white in particular will provide bright and timeless style.

products.title: Gloss White Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Who doesnt love a glossy finish? Its such a great way to finish off a room and its even better when you have to do next to no work to get it. This gloss white perfect fit venetian will brighten up your conservatory in an instant and its so easy to install youll wonder why y who doesnt love a glossy finish? Its such a great way to finish off a room and its even better when you have to do next to no work to get it.

products.title: Meadow Flower Asc Spring Perfect Fit
products.description: Part of their meadow flower range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.

products.title: Hive Plain Barley Perfect Fit
products.description: Hiveplainbarleyperfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hiveprivacy non-blackoutrange, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hiveplain" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords punched through the face or back of the fabric. Made to measure hive plain barley perfect fit pleated blind px71003.

products.title: Sakura Grey Perfect Fit
products.description: Part of oursakura patterned range, with a simple floral design which will bring warmth to any room. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through.
